channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Election Opportunity Window
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The CBOE Volatility Index (VIX) is back at one of its highest levels of the year, indicating increased market tension. With the market...
